data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Bắc Kạn to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bắc Kạn, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Bắc Kạn, Vietnam to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Bắc Kạn, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Bắc Kạn, Vietnam.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Japanese people.
Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 6,681 believers living in the state of Bắc Kạn. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Father, help the 6,681 believers in Bắc Kạn to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Bắc Kạn to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
